verses.verse: Therefore <S%G5105><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> So Great <S%G5118><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Encompassing <S%G4029><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> A Cloud <S%G3509><s%> Of Witnesses, <S%G3144><s%> Weight <S%G3591><s%> Having Laid Aside <S%G659><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Easily Surrounding <S%G2139><s%> Sin, <S%G266><s%> ' With <S%G1223><s%> Endurance <S%G5281><s%> We Should Run <S%G5143><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lying Before <S%G4295><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> Race <S%G73><s%>

Looking Away <S%G872><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Faith <S%G4102><s%> Leader <S%G747><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Completer <S%G5051><s%> Jesus : <S%G2424><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> In View Of <S%G473><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lying Before <S%G4295><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> Endured The <S%G5278><s%> Cross, The <S%G4716><s%> Shame <S%G152><s%> Having Despised, <S%G2706><s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1188><s%> And At The Right Hand <S%G5037><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Sat Down. <S%G2523><s%>

<S%G357><s%> For Consider Well <S%G1063><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> So Great <S%G5108><s%> Has Endured <S%G5278><s%> From <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sinners <S%G268><s%> Against <S%G1519><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> Gainsaying, <S%G485><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Ye Be Wearied, <S%G2577><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> In Your Souls <S%G5216><s%> Fainting. <S%G1590><s%>
Not Yet <S%G3768><s%> Unto <S%G3360><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> Resisted Ye <S%G478><s%> Against <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sin <S%G266><s%> Wrestling, <S%G464><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Have Quite Forgotten <S%G1585><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Exhortation, <S%G3874><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> To Sons, <S%G5207><s%> He Addresses : <S%G1256><s%> <S%G5207><s%> My Son, <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Despise Not The <S%G3643><s%> Discipline <S%G3809><s%> Of The Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> Faint, <S%G1590><s%> ' By <S%G5259><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Being Reproved; <S%G1651><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> For Whom <S%G1063><s%> Loves The <S%G25><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> He Disciplines, <S%G3811><s%> <S%G3146><s%> And Scourges <S%G1161><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> He Receives. <S%G3858><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> Discipline <S%G3809><s%> Ye Endure, <S%G5278><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> With Sons <S%G5207><s%> With You <S%G5213><s%> Is Dealing <S%G4374><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%> <S%G5101><s%> For Who <S%G1063><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The Son <S%G5207><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Disciplines Not The <S%G3811><s%> Father? <S%G3962><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Without <S%G5565><s%> Ye Are <S%G2075><s%> Discipline, <S%G3809><s%> Of Which <S%G3739><s%> Partakers <S%G3353><s%> Have Become <S%G1096><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> Then <S%G686><s%> Bastards <S%G3541><s%> Ye Are <S%G2075><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Sons. <S%G5207><s%>

Moreover <S%G1534><s%> <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Of Our <S%G2257><s%> Fathers <S%G3962><s%> We Have Had As <S%G2192><s%> Those Who Discipline Us, <S%G3810><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> We Respected Them; <S%G1788><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> Shall We Be In Subjection <S%G5293><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Spirits, <S%G4151><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Live? <S%G2198><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G3303><s%> For They Indeed <S%G1063><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> A Few <S%G3641><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Seemed Good <S%G1380><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Disciplined; <S%G3811><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> For <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Profit, <S%G4851><s%> For Us <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Partake <S%G3335><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G41><s%> Of His Holiness. <S%G846><s%>

Any <S%G3956><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Discipline <S%G3809><s%> <S%G4314><s%> For <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3588><s%> The Present <S%G3918><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Seems Not Matter <S%G1380><s%> Of Joy <S%G5479><s%> To Be, <S%G1511><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Of Grief; <S%G3077><s%> <S%G5305><s%> But Afterwards <S%G1161><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> Peaceable <S%G1516><s%> To Those <S%G3588><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Having Been Exercised <S%G1128><s%> Renders <S%G591><s%> Of Righteousness. <S%G1343><s%>
Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hanging Down <S%G3935><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Enfeebled <S%G3886><s%> Knees <S%G1119><s%> Lift Up; <S%G461><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Paths <S%G5163><s%> Straight <S%G3717><s%> Make <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> For Your Feet, <S%G5216><s%> <S%G2443><s%> Lest <S%G3361><s%> That Which Is <S%G3588><s%> Lame <S%G5560><s%> Be Turned Aside; <S%G1624><s%> <S%G2390><s%> But That It May Be Healed <S%G1161><s%> Rather. <S%G3123><s%>

Peace <S%G1515><s%> Pursue <S%G1377><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sanctification, <S%G38><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Apart From <S%G5565><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Shall See <S%G3700><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%>

Looking Diligently <S%G1983><s%> Lest <S%G3361><s%> Any <S%G5100><s%> <S%G5302><s%> Lack <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God; <S%G2316><s%> Lest <S%G3361><s%> Any <S%G5100><s%> Root <S%G4491><s%> Of Bitterness <S%G4088><s%> Up <S%G507><s%> Springing <S%G5453><s%> Should Trouble You, <S%G1776><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Be Defiled <S%G3392><s%> Many; <S%G4183><s%>

Lest There Be <S%G3361><s%> Any <S%G5100><s%> Fornicator <S%G4205><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Profane Person, <S%G952><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Esau, <S%G2269><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> For <S%G473><s%> Meal <S%G1035><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Sold <S%G591><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Birthright <S%G4415><s%> His; <S%G846><s%>

Ye Know <S%G2467><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Afterwards, <S%G3347><s%> Wishing <S%G2309><s%> To Inherit <S%G2816><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Blessing, <S%G2129><s%> He Was Rejected, <S%G593><s%> <S%G3341><s%> For Of Repentance <S%G1063><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Found Not, <S%G2147><s%> Although <S%G2539><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Tears <S%G1144><s%> Having Earnestly Sought <S%G1567><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Ye Have Come To <S%G4334><s%> Being Touched The <S%G5584><s%>, Mount <S%G3735><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Been Kindled <S%G2545><s%> With Fire, <S%G4442><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Obscurity, <S%G1105><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, To Darkness, <S%G4655><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Tempest, <S%G2366><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Trumpet's <S%G4536><s%> To Sound, <S%G2279><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Voice <S%G5456><s%> Of Words; <S%G4487><s%> Which Voice <S%G3739><s%> They That <S%G3588><s%> Heard <S%G191><s%> Excused Themselves Asking <S%G3868><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Be Addressed <S%G4369><s%> To Them The <S%G846><s%> Word; <S%G3056><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> <S%G5342><s%> For They Could Not Bear <S%G1063><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Commanded : <S%G1291><s%> And If <S%G2579><s%> A Beast <S%G2342><s%> Should Touch <S%G2345><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mountain, <S%G3735><s%> It Shall Be Stoned, <S%G3036><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> With A Dart <S%G1002><s%> Shot Through; <S%G2700><s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> Fearful <S%G5398><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spectacle That <S%G5324><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Greatly Afraid <S%G1630><s%> I Am <S%G1510><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Trembling : <S%G1790><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> Ye Have Come To <S%G4334><s%> Sion <S%G4622><s%> Mount; <S%G3735><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> The Living, <S%G2198><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> Heavenly; <S%G2032><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Myraids <S%G3461><s%> Of Angels, <S%G32><s%>

The Universal Gathering; <S%G3831><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The Assembly <S%G1577><s%> Of The Firstborn Ones <S%G4416><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> Registered; <S%G583><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The Judge <S%G2923><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of All; <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The Spirits <S%G4151><s%> Of The Just <S%G1342><s%> Who Have Been Perfected; <S%G5048><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Of A Covenant <S%G1242><s%> Fresh <S%G3501><s%> Mediator <S%G3316><s%> To Jesus; <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The Blood <S%G129><s%> Of Sprinkling, <S%G4473><s%> Better Things <S%G2909><s%> Speaking <S%G2980><s%> Than <S%G3844><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Abel. <S%G6><s%>

Take Heed <S%G991><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Ye Refuse Not <S%G3868><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Speaks. <S%G2980><s%> <S%G1487><s%> For If <S%G1063><s%> They <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3756><s%>, Escaped Not, <S%G5343><s%> Him That <S%G3588><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth Who <S%G1093><s%> Refused <S%G3868><s%> Divinely Instructed Them, <S%G5537><s%> <S%G4183><s%> Much More <S%G3123><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Him <S%G3588><s%> ' From The <S%G575><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> Turn Away From! <S%G654><s%>

Whose <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> Shook <S%G4531><s%> Then; <S%G5119><s%> <S%G3568><s%> But Now <S%G1161><s%> He Has Promised, <S%G1861><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Yet <S%G2089><s%> Once <S%G530><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Shake 4579 V-PAI-1S Not 3756 PRT-N Only 3440 ADV The 3588 T-ASF Earth, 1093 N-ASF But 235 CONJ Also 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-ASM Heaven. 3772 N-ASM

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Yet <S%G2089><s%> Once, <S%G530><s%> Signifies <S%G1213><s%> Of The Things <S%G3588><s%> Shaken <S%G4531><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Removing, <S%G3331><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Having Been Made, <S%G4160><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> May Remain <S%G3306><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Not Shaken. <S%G4531><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> A Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Not To Be Shaken <S%G761><s%> Receiving, <S%G3880><s%> May We Have <S%G2192><s%> Grace, <S%G5485><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> We May Serve <S%G3000><s%> Well Pleasingly <S%G2102><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Reverence <S%G127><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fear. <S%G2124><s%>
<S%G2532><s%> For Also <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> Our God <S%G2257><s%> Is A Fire <S%G4442><s%> Consuming. <S%G2654><s%>
